recipe_instructions: 1. Wash and chop potatoes and sweet potatoes into bite-sized pieces. 2. Toss with olive oil, salt, and pepper. 3. Spread on a baking sheet and roast in a preheated oven at 400°F (200°C) for 20-25 minutes, or until tender.

1. Cook ditalini pasta according to package directions. 2. While pasta cooks, sauté chopped zucchini and mushrooms in butter until softened. Season with salt and pepper to taste. 3. Drain the pasta and add it to the pan with the vegetables. Toss to combine.
1. Heat olive oil in a pan. Add chopped zucchini, mushrooms, and parsley. Sauté until softened. 2. Season with salt and pepper. Serve as a side dish.
1. Heat a pan. Add chopped cilantro and sauté until fragrant (about 1 minute). 2. Season with salt to taste. Serve as a garnish for other dishes or as a side.

1. If using store-bought tortillas, warm them according to package directions. 2. Layer the tortillas with desired ingredients (e.g., leftover roasted sweet potatoes and vegetables). 3. Roll up and enjoy!
